mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_point ( user_id, point, reason, regist_time,open_time,close_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{point}, #{reason},now(),#{open_time},#{close_time})
mapper.select: SELECT u.nickname ,sum(POINT) AS point FROM tbl_point p JOIN tbl_user u ON (p.user_id = u.id) GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY sum(POINT) DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT SUM(point) AS point FROM tbl_point GROUP BY user_id HAVING user_id = #{userId}
